content:
As an AI language model, I don't have access to the latest information on specific accommodations or airlines that have particularly good COVID-19 safety measures in place for traveling to these destinations. However, I can offer you some general tips for finding accommodations and airlines with good COVID-19 safety measures:

1. Look for accommodations and airlines that have implemented enhanced cleaning and sanitizing protocols.

2. Consider airlines that have implemented social distancing measures or have blocked off middle seats.

3. Check if the accommodation or airline requires proof of a negative COVID-19 test or vaccination.

4. Consider accommodations or airlines that offer flexible booking policies or free cancellations in case of travel restrictions and last-minute changes.

5. Look for accommodations or airlines that clearly communicate their COVID-19 policies on their websites or through customer service.

6. Check for reviews from recent travelers who have shared their experiences regarding COVID-19 safety measures.

Remember that COVID-19 policies and regulations can change at any time, so it's essential to stay updated and adhere to the guidelines provided by your destination's local authorities and your airline or accommodation provider.
